prompts: Create a cute fairy-type Pokemon that has big ears and fluffy features.
Imagine a Pokemon with pink fur and bright blue eyes that loves to sing.
Design a fluffy, round creature that can float in the air gracefully.
Give me a whimsical Pokemon that has a playful personality and colorful accents.
Show me a small, adorable Pokemon that thrives in forests and plays with friends.
Generate a Pokemon with a round body, large ears, and a cheerful demeanor.
Make a fairy-type Pokemon that looks soft and cuddly, perfect for a child’s toy.
